forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms between 2pm and 5pm, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
